          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A genetikai kód és a fehérjeszintézis</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Genetic Code And Protein Synthesis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Genetische Code-Und Protein-Synthese</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Synthèse Génétique de Code et de Protéine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Síntese Genetic Do Código E Da Proteína</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sintesi Genetica Della Proteina E Di Codice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο γενετικός κώδικας και η πρωτεϊνική σύνθεση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Síntesis Genética Del Código Y De la 
Proteína</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A genetikai kód jellemzői, a polipeptidek szintézise riboszómán, a fehérjék utólagos módosítása, sejten belüli szállítása</string>
            <string language="en-US">Characteristcs of Genetic Code, Synthesis of Polypeptids on Ribosomes, Post Modification and Intracellular Transportation of Proteins</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">biológia</string>
            <string language="en-US">biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">felépítő folyamatok</string>
            <string language="en-US">composing processes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">biokémia</string>
            <string language="en-US">biochemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">sejtbiológia</string>
            <string language="en-US">cell biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">fehérjeszintézis</string>
            <string language="en-US">protein synthesis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">genetikai kód</string>
            <string language="en-US">genetic code</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Characteristcs des genetischen Codes, der 
Synthese von Polypeptids auf Ribosom, der Pfosten-Änderung und des 
intrazellulären Transportes der Proteine</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Characteristcs de code génétique, de synthèse 
de Polypeptids sur des ribosomes, de modification de poteau et de 
transport intracellulaire des protéines</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Characteristcs do código genetic, da síntese de 
Polypeptids nos ribosomes, da modificação do borne e do transporte 
intracellular das proteínas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Characteristcs del codice genetico, della sintesi 
di Polypeptids sui ribosomi, della modifica dell'alberino e del 
trasporto intracellulare delle proteine</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Characteristcs του γενετικού κώδικα, σύνθεση 
Polypeptids στα ριβοσώματα, μετα τροποποίηση και ενδοκυτταρική 
μεταφορά των πρωτεϊνών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Characteristcs del código genético, de la 
síntesis de Polypeptids en los ribosomes, de la modificación del 
poste y del transporte intracelular de proteínas</string>
          </description>
